categories: Category:Military officers of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Sergeant Sager was a Human male serving in the Imperial Military of the reconstituted Sith Empire during the Galactic War with the Galactic Republic. Following the Battle of Rishi, he was part of Darth Marr's force that traveled to Yavin 4 and established the anti-Revanite Yavin Coalition along with Republic forces under Satele Shan. There, Sager asked a fellow Coalition member to assist his men in eliminating local predatory wildlife such as the bloodthirsty Lurkers, in Yavin 4's jungles.
Sergeant Sager appears in the Star Wars: The Old Republic: Shadow of Revan expansion, released on December 2, 2014.
